header.name: Néné Marcelle Blandine BALDE
header.title: Software and Information System Engineer
header.tagline: I build accessible, pixel-perfect digital experiences for the web.

about.title: Professional Profile
about.description:
Software engineering engineer with over 3 years of experience in development, maintenance and deployment of computer applications for institutional and commercial projects. I have worked on web and desktop applications, using Java, Spring Boot, Angular, Python and Django, as well as MySQL and PostgreSQL databases.

My experiences include frontend development, test automation, setting up CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, and performing performance and manual testing. Accustomed to working in structured environments, I am focused on quality, security and collaboration.

I wish to continue my career in a stimulating and international environment, deepen my technical skills and contribute to ambitious projects by combining technical expertise and methodological rigor.

items.title: Software and Information System Engineer
missions: Development of an application for managing tourist tax collection with jhipster [Tools: angular, springboot, postgres]
Corrective maintenance of an application for managing universal health coverage (SEN-CSU), for managing insured persons and health organizations. [Tools: angular, springboot, mysql]
Development of an offline desktop application for managing universal health coverage (SEN-CSU). Synchronization with online data [Tools: electron js, sqlite]
Development of an application for access control in a company [Tools: php, angular]

Development of an application for tracking enrollments with SYLAB (mobile and desktop application): display of enrolled data, user creation, structure creation, enrollment method configuration... [Tools: Springboot, angular, mysql]

Manual testing, performance testing. [Tools: Selenium, Appium, JMeter, Cucumber, Jenkins]

items.name: Multi-warehouse Management Platform
items.description: Digital platform consisting of a web application, a mobile application and an integrated marketplace. The platform provides real-time visibility of warehouse activities (stock, invoice, sales, logs, etc.) and integrates artificial intelligence features for stock-out forecasting, inventory level optimization and sales forecasting.
items.technologies: Spring Boot, Angular, MySQL, Flutter, AWS EC2, Docker

items.name: ClassPass – Service Booking Platform
items.description: Web application allowing clients to book services (hairdressing, beauty, massage, etc.) from partner providers. Providers have a dashboard to manage their availability, services, bookings and revenue.
items.role: Architecture design, frontend and backend development, implementation of main features and testing
